definition: (slang) to cheer sb on/to show one's support/("call" is pronounced approximately like English "call")
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
(originally) to provide assistance/(more recently) to show one's support (for a singing idol etc)
(Internet slang) to form a hand heart using one's thumb and forefinger (or by using both hands)
to add oil/to top up with gas/to refuel/to accelerate/to step on the gas/(fig.) to make an extra effort/to cheer sb on
(Internet slang) to go from being indifferent to being a big fan
to cheer for/to encourage/to boost the morale of
to campaign for votes/to ask voters for support
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
to be a spokesperson/to be an ambassador (for a brand)/to endorse
